CustomField.description: The business activity based on the scheme used for the industry code (e.g., 'highway and street construction' is the description of industry code 1611 in the U.S. SIC (Standard Industrial Classification) system).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The business activity based on the scheme used for the industry code (e.g., 'highway and street construction' is the description of industry code 1611 in the U.S. SIC (Standard Industrial Classification) system).
CustomField.label: SIC4 Code 1 Description
